page.title: 03EPPING'S GREEN BARRIER
page.content: You can never feel there is not somewhere to have a quiet walk in {Epping.Epping Forest}is there for your enjoyment.It cost Â£8,000,000 to run annually,and is now about 6,000 acres but was 10 times bigger 200 years ago.It covers{Theydon Bois,Buckhurst {Hill,Chingford,Loughton,}and the boundaries of{London,}as well as Epping.The conservators do jobs like cutting down trees (which they don't replant because of natural regrowth), keeping the Forest tidy,and patrolling it.More people are riding vehicles illegally through Epping Forest,taking horses in prohibited parts,using firearms, throwing litter,and hunting with a dog. The punishment for these offences is usually a fine.Holding back London from the people of Epping, this God-made{nature reserve}is a pleasure for which they are grateful.
